title: [An Attempt at] a Final Theory of General Relativity
description:
reference: viXra:2211.0025v1
title: [An Attempt at] a Final Theory of General Relativity
authors: Manfred U. E. Pohl
category: Relativity and Cosmology
type: submission
date: 2022-11-04 01:14:13
abstract: It is briefly shown that all physical theories fall back on a mathematical application of the circle number π and that Gravitation, Electricity and Magnetism are united by understanding that in addition to Einsteins finding - that the Vacuum constant speed of light represents the dimension of time in Vacuum at rest - we need also to consider that Vacuum permeability and Vacuum permittivity represent the dimension of length in Vacuum at rest.
